Html:
I've updated the version of the TaskScheduler NuGet package our code uses to 2.0.0 but now it seems like the NuGet package has added a reference in our project to a DLL called NCrontab.dll.

NCrontab.dll should be removed from the NuGet package since the standalone ZIP downloaded from the Downloads page doesn't include it and doesn't seem to be required anyway.
Thank you. I have corrected this and when I post the 2.0.3 NuGet package it will be remediated.
